titleStmt.title: By his Maiesties Councell for Virginia. Whereas vpon the returne of Sir Thomas Dale Knight, (Marshall of Virginia) the Treasurer, Councell, and Company of the same, haue beene throughly informed and assured of the good estate of that colony ...
titleStmt.author: Counseil for Virginia (England and Wales)
Virginia Company of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
